application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Back Garden (Left Boundary) T1: Thuja tree - Cut back by 1m to stand just off boundaryheight 5m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5m & spread to 3mT2: Photinia shrub - Reduce height by 1m, Reduce sides 0.5 - 1m back to hardwood to allow more light height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 2.5mT3: Maple tree - Cut overhang by 1 - 1.5m back to boundary  height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5mT4: Elaeagnus shrub - Reduce height by 1m, Reduce sides by 0.5 - 1m back to hardwood to allow more light height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 2.5mT5: Leylandii hedge - Cut back to boundary by 2mheight 5m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 5m & spread to 3mT6: Forsythia shrub - Reduce by  2m back to hardwood height 3m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 1m & spread to 2m(Back Boundary) T7: Buddleia tree - Fell to ground level height 2m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mT8: Leylandii hedge - Reduce height by 2 - 2.5m [set height with client on the day], trim tight to shape (both sides) height 5m & spread 7m. Reduce height to 4m & spread to 6mReason for work General tree maintenance More light Reduce shading to house suppressing growth of shrubs
